law.catch_line: FEE; SEPARATE LICENSE FOR EACH FACILITY OPERATED.

structure.unit: ARTICLE D. - STABLES AND HOLDING FACILITIES

section.text: The annual license fee for a pet shop shall be imposed pursuant to the provisions of Part 2, Chapter 2 of this Code relating to merchants. Pet shop licensees shall be required to obtain a separate license for each other holding facility operated on the same premises as the pet shop. (Code 1959 , §4-25)
